Sentencas: We have investigated the deposition of 91% ZrO(2) - 9% Y(2)O(3) thin films by a variety of sputtering techniques for the application as electrolytes in thin film solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The deposition by RF sputtering was accomplished by using an oxide target of the desired composition.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The deposition rate in these initial tests was limited to 0.5 mu m/hr and the morphology of the film was substantially modified by deposition rate and substrate temperature.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Using DC magnetron sputtering we deposited metallic films from a metallic target with the desired chemical composition.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We introduced oxygen into the sputtering chamber to reactively deposit the desired 91% ZrO(2) - 9% Y(2)O(3) thin films; however, we encountered problems with target oxidation and growth rate reproducibility.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We subsequently demonstrated that controlled oxidation of the metallic films could result in adhering, non porous yttria stabilized zirconia films.
Titulo: Thin Film Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
